column4: hmm, this may sound a bit silly, but is there any easy way to remove the overly wordy "3 Beta 5" from the Firefox title bar in hardy?
it seems a bit unpolished and space-wasting for all of my firefox windows to say "Mozilla Firefox 3 Beta 5" in the title - just wondering if there's a way to trim it down :)
best to ask in the Firefox channel, it might even be in the Firefox options
